description:
Ugumori Ayano is the daughter of http://anidb.net/ch148707 [Souichi] and http://anidb.net/ch148708 [Etsuko]. She is a student at the Tokyo Metropolitan Mitogawa High School and is very close with http://anidb.net/ch148706 [Iida Kenzou], a boy from http://anidb.net/ch145182 [Kusakabe Kanna]`s class. Her mother disappeared without a trace years before, making her father believe that she was "spirited away".
Upon learning that her mother is alive and well she decides to meet her in person. Wanting her father to not suspect anything she stages her disappearance in the same manner as her mother before, with the help of Kenzou and his mother, http://anidb.net/ch148710 [Yoshimi].
name: Ugumori Ayano
